xml.data:
Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 6 Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga » 6.2 Abhidhammabhājanīya » 6.2.11 Abyākataniddesa » 6.2.11.1 Kusalavipākacitta
6.2.11.1.2 Kāmāvacaravipākacitta
Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga
Abhidhammabhājanīya
Abyākataniddesa
Kusalavipākacitta
Kāmāvacaravipākacitta
319.
1262Katame dhammā abyākatā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā…pe…  somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena…pe…  somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā…pe…  somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena…pe…  upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā…pe…  upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena…pe…  upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā…pe…  upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇā vā…pe…  dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
320.
1263Tattha katamo saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “saṅkhāro”.
1264Tattha katamaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ? Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe…  tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—  idaṃ vuccati “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ” …pe…  ayaṃ vuccati “phassapaccayā vedanā”.
1265Tattha katamo vedanāpaccayā pasādo? Yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo—  ayaṃ vuccati “vedanāpaccayā pasādo”.
1266Tattha katamo pasādapaccayā adhimokkho? Yo cittassa adhimokkho adhimuccanā tadadhimuttatā—  ayaṃ vuccati “pasādapaccayā adhimokkho”.
1267Tattha katamo adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo? Ṭhapetvā adhimokkhaṃ, vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho—  ayaṃ vuccati “adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo” …pe…  tena vuccati “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti.
